Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-22872 affecting package multus for versions less than 4.0.2-5
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-22872 affecting package multus for versions less than 4.0.2-5. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package multus is earlier than 4.0.2-5, affected by CVE-2025-22872
